text: Lafoensia is a genus of plant in family Lythraceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): Lafoensia glyptocarpa Lafoensia pacari St.-Hil. Lafoensia punicifolia DC. Lafoensia replicata Pohl Lafoensia speciosa DC. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Lythraceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lafoensia
